attributes.action: Oppose the repeal of the Hunting Act 2004.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In opposition of the argument of tradition due with fox hunting. In essence, politicianry was tradition but it is no longer accepted. Granting the right to hunt foxes in an inhumane way is a step backwards in animal rights and shouldn't even be considered as a valid proposal.

Oppose this ridiculous petition or move backwards in to cruel traditions.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Oppose the repeal of the Hunting Act 2004."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13974.asp

Prime Minister's Office
